Description: Limestone ostracon with remains of 8 lines of text on recto and 10 lines on verso.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably from the Excavation 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (215-220, pl.26)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82891) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82891)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 25 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
